name: Alice Running Adventures
description:
What will Alice face in Wonderland? You can feel it with her in this 3D action game. She uses her umbrella as weapon. To destroy anything blocked her. Of cause she is looking for her the most favorite cakes. You can find different type of cake in this Wonderland. Upgrade them to reach more function. To get more coin, and try more dressing.

  • Different Worlds for you to explore and more world are coming
  • Different cake types to unlock
